titleStmt.title: De vniversali et novissima Ivdæorum vocatione secundum apertissimam Divi Pauli prophetiam, in vltimis hisce diebus prłstanda liber vnus. Vbi demonstratur, tum quem in modum illius gentis conversio expectanda sit, tum quid eam maximè adhuc impediat & remoretur, & alia explicantur quæ ad huius rei cognitionem necessaria videri possint.
titleStmt.author: Willet, Andrew, 1562-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ex officina Johannis Legati Cantabrigiensis typographi,

notesStmt.note: Leaves 20 and 24 misnumbered 16 and 20; 9-11 missing in number only.
Errata on verso of K2, final page.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
